Screenshots

The graphical user interface to ProGuard works like a wizard. It allows you to browse through the presented tabs and fill them out.

You can click on the small tab buttons to see the full-size versions of the tabs.

Of course, real developers don't need all this point-and-click fluff. They write short configuration files using their favorite text editors and invoke ProGuard from the command-line.

You can click on the image to see the full-size version.
